main: ^Can you tell me what is your job here?
^I need the code to the rafinery.
jobDescription: ^I give permissions and licences to important thlakahans...You don't look like an important thlakahan.
rafiteryCode: ^Code to rafinery? You need to have a written permission for that.
^Well I don't have a written permission for that
^Here's the written permission for the rafinery code

c-0: ^In that case, please don't disturb me any longer. Come back if you have the permission.

giveGlejt: ^Oh! Sure, here you are. The rafinery code!
